Typealiases.html#/s:12YPersistence16Uniq.name: UniqueIdentifier
Typealiases.html#/s:12YPersistence16Uniq.abstract: Any value type that can represent a unique identifier for a data record (String, Int, UInt, UUID, etc.)

Protocols/SyncRecord.html#/s:12YPersiste.name: wasDeletedKey

Protocols/DataRecord.html#/s:12YPersiste.name: uidKey

Protocols/CoreModel.html#/s:12YPersisten.name: UidType

Protocols/DataRecord.html.name: DataRecord
Protocols/DataRecord.html.abstract: Represents a uniquely identifiable Core Data record as returned by a fetch request.

Protocols/RecordToModel.html.name: RecordToModel
Protocols/RecordToModel.html.abstract: Represents a Core Data record that can be converted into a model object

Protocols/SyncRecord.html.name: SyncRecord
Protocols/SyncRecord.html.abstract: Represents status of record data, uploaded and deleted

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Container to encapsulates the Core Data stack.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Initializes a Persistence Manager. This should be called

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Core Data model name

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: mergePolicy
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: The merge policy to apply to all contexts

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: mainContext
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Returns the main context, suitable for read-only operations.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: workerContext
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Returns a new private queue context, suitable for short-lived add, edit, delete operations

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: contextForThread()
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Returns a long-lived context appropriate for fetching results appropriate for the current thread.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Asynchronously load the persistence store.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: destroy(completion:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Delete all stores from Core Data

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Delete entity from Core Data using batch delete.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Delete all records for an entity (database table).

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: delete(entity:predicate:saveEvery:context:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Delete records matching the specified predicate.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: manualDeleteAll(entityName:saveEvery:context:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Delete all records for an entity (database table).

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Delete entity from Core Data using batch delete.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: entityNamesForClear()
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: List of all entities to be erased upon clear().

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: clear()
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Clear the datbase model. By default this will fetch a list of entity names via

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: delete(entity:uid:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Delete records with the matching unique identifier

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: delete(entity:uids:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Delete records with the matching unique identifiers

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: deleteModel(entity:model:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Delete the specified model.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: deleteModels(entity:models:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Delete the specified models.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: fetchRecords(predicate:sortDescriptors:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Fetches managed object records from Core Data.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: fetchModels(entity:uids:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Fetches records from Core Data and convert those to models.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: fetchModel(entity:uid:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Fetches a single matching record from Core Data and convert it to a model object.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: save(entity:models:shouldOverwrite:context:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Converts an array of models to Core Data records and synchronously saves them.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: fetchRecordsToUpload(context:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Fetches records that are awaiting upload.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: fetchRecordsToUpdate(context:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Fetches records that have been updated (but not deleted) since the last sync.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: fetchRecordsToDelete(context:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Fetches records that have been marked for deletion since the last sync.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: markRecordsAsUploaded(entity:uids:context:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Mark records as uploaded. Do this after they have been been successfully uploaded to remote.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: markRecordsAsDeleted(entity:uids:context:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Mark selected records as being deleted locally.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.name: markAllRecordsAsDeleted(entity:context:)
Classes/PersistenceManager.html#/s:12YPe.abstract: Mark all records as being deleted locally. Any local fetches should exclude records where wasDeleted == true.

Classes/PersistenceManager.html.name: PersistenceManager
Classes/PersistenceManager.html.abstract: Manages access to a Core Data stack
